name: Tartle's Floppy Disk Glitch
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36 by the Tartle Wizard @Tartle_Games! The theme was Ancient Technology. A floppy disk is ancient enough, right?

This is an experimental game. After you beat the first level you will see why. I hope you enjoy it on some strange level.

The full Unity Project is included as the other download. Made with Unity 4.
